prompt:
I have the following count table for an RNA-seq experiment, rows are genes and columns are samples, "Supplementary_Table_1_exp.xlsx". The first column of the file is my gene names and the rest of the columns are samples. My annotation data is here  "SRP021193.colData.tsv", it contains sample annotations and rows of this matches the columns of count table, first column is the sample ids. Find genes specific for each "group" in my annotation data  using statistical tests. Plot PCA only using "group" specific genes and color code PCA by "group" variable in my annotation data.

here are first few lines of the file(s).

Supplementary_Table_1_exp.xlsx:
Genes	CASE_1	CASE_2	CASE_3	CASE_4	CASE_5	CASE_6	CTRL_1	CTRL_2	CTRL_3	CTRL_4	CTRL_5	CTRL_6
TSPAN6	9832	25521	23529	0	32	0	10558	20573	6507	0	0	 0
TNMD	3281	 7167	 3435	0	 0	0	  202	  403	 203	0	0	21


SRP021193.colData.tsv:
	diagnosis	group	LibrarySelection
CASE_1	non-ischemic cardiomyopathy	CASE	cDNA


response:
```
# Load necessary libraries
library(readxl)
library(DESeq2)
library(ggplot2)

# Read count table
count_table <- read_excel("Supplementary_Table_1_exp.xlsx")

# Remove rows with all zeros
count_table <- count_table[rowSums(count_table[, -1]) > 0, ]

# Read annotation data
annotation_data <- read.table("SRP021193.colData.tsv", header = TRUE, sep = "\t")

# Match columns of count table with rows of annotation data
matched_data <- count_table[, names(count_table) %in% annotation_data$diagnosis]

# Store group information
group_info <- unique(annotation_data$group)

# Create a list to store genes specific for each group
specific_genes <- list()

# Perform statistical test for each group
for (group in group_info) {
  # Extract samples for the group
  group_samples <- annotation_data$diagnosis[annotation_data$group == group]
  
  # Subset count table with group samples
  group_data <- matched_data[, group_samples]
  
  # Perform differential expression analysis using DESeq2
  dds <- DESeqDataSetFromMatrix(countData = group_data,
                                colData = data.frame(condition = rep(group, length(group_samples))),
                                design = ~condition)
  dds <- DESeq(dds)
  
  # Find differentially expressed genes
  res <- results(dds)
  specific_genes[[group]] <- row.names(res[significantly DE,])
}

# Merge specific genes for all groups
all_specific_genes <- do.call(c, specific_genes)

# Subset count table with specific genes
specific_data <- matched_data[all_specific_genes, ]

# Perform PCA
pca <- prcomp(t(specific_data))

# Plot PCA colored by group
ggplot(data = data.frame(PC1 = pca$x[, 1], PC2 = pca$x[, 2], group = annotation_data$group),
       aes(x = PC1, y = PC2, color = group)) +
  geom_point() +
  labs(title = "PCA of Group-Specific Genes", x = "PC1", y = "PC2")
}
```
